name: Tank Battle Storm 3D
description:
Fast paced 3D tank action on your IOS device. Take out your enemies with cannons, heat seekers, and howitzers. Battle against cunning enemies and become the Tank Hero Legend!
"Tank Battle Storm 3D is a fun, simple game that evolves the concept" - Slide To Play
FEATURES:
* Battle tanks over 40 levels
* Campaign game modes
* 4 weapons to choose from
* 5 types of AI tanks to fight against
* Support for HD devices and tablets
